changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]Enhancement[/b] View authors scores for reviews
[b]Enhancement[/b] Redesign staff & character pages
[b]Enhancement[/b] Viewing messages, comments, replies redesigned
[b]Enhancement[/b] Reviews can now be seen even if the user is not signed in
[b]Feature[/b] Better support for composing & editing posts, [b]select text and apply styling[/b]
[b]Feature[/b] More results on search page, including characters and actors
[b]Feature[/b] New AnitrendHub items, including some experimental features which will be available in the next release
[b]Feature[/b] New and improved WebM video player with gesture support for volume, seek & brightness
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Editing status posts inside your profile trims text, if emojis are added
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Navigation tab truncating long titles & missing some characters for languages
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Crashes with youtube videos in comment screen
[b]Bug Fix[/b] On hold & completed collections swapped
[b]Notice![/b] When reporting crashes please include steps to reproduce the crash, if applicable
[b]Unstable Feature[/b] Multi-language support for Arabic, Deutsch, Spanish, French & Italian [b]N.B[/b] This is still in the alpha phase, which means this feature is bound to break!
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Authentication issues have been fixed
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Reverted plugin version from updated versions should resolve most crashes
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Authentication problems fixed? Please let me know
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Crashes on new installation
[b]Bug Fixes[/b] Multiple bug fixes from the previous version
[b]Feature[/b] Infinite scrolling on discover, hub and trending pages
[b]Feature[/b] View other users anime and manga lists by tapping on the labels on their profiles
[b]Feature[/b] View non YouTube videos (webm) on status posts directly from the app
[b]Feature[/b] Now you can add emojis in your replies or comments even status posts
[b]Feature[/b] View studios with the anime collections associated with them
[b]Feature[/b] View popular, latest, controversial reviews from the navigation pane
[b]Feature[/b] View user profiles by tapping the mentioned user tag within the application
[b]Feature[/b] More performance improvement stability tweaks
changelogversion.changelogbug: Rotation is affected when you scroll past a webm video
changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]What is Next?[/b] Translation for several languages! In the next version [b]0.9.9r8[/b]
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Patch for devices running lollipop
[b]Feature[/b] Multiple filter types available
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Many other bugs throughout the app
[b]Feature[/b] AniTrend will now open the Anime & Manga links from your web browser
[b]Feature[/b] In application version update checker which will be replacing the Storage menu item
[b]Feature[/b] Extending search bar functionality to do filtering of your Anime or Manga lists
[b]Optimizations[/b] Reduced overdraw & optimized layouts for better render performance
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Profiles multiple images
[b]Feature[/b] Search for other users available from the search bar
[b]Feature[/b] View likes on progress, messages, comments & status
[b]Feature[/b] Auto detection of videos, on status activities
[b]Feature[/b] Order By option in filter action, allowing to order by sort criteria
[b]Feature[/b] Filter setting are now applied to your My Anime & Manga Lists
[b]Bug Fixes[/b] Several bug fixes which were reported in version 0.9.9r2
[b]Bonus![/b] A couple of features which your discover :)
[b]Feature[/b] Send and read messages between users, sending is done from a users profile. Just tap on the users picture
[b]Feature[/b] Follow & unfollow users, includes viewing their profile but no anime data can be viewed
[b]Feature[/b] Clickable links from the home pages (Status & Public Status)
[b]Feature[/b] Create, edit & delete activity posts. Status posts can be created from the search bar menu or in the profile page.
[b]Feature[/b] Tap and hold on anime or manga items in the home or profile pages (Status & Public Status)
[b]Feature[/b] Actors page with all related anime, Staff listings in details pages
[b]Fix[/b] Almost all the application pages now include both light and dark theme
[b]Fix[/b] Notifications subject customization for non expanded notifications to display related info
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Notifications caused exceptions to be thrown when the application isn't running (Confirmation Required)
[b]Feature Patch[/b] Navigating from notifications to actual activity of origin
[b]Feature Patch[/b] Both old and new list style for airing anime support
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Notifications should work now
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Airing anime states consistency fixes
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Smart progress increment not working for manga
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Infinite scrolling for home pages
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Loss of scroll position when liking activities
[b]NEW[/b] Airing anime & popular anime episodes from the navigation menu
[b]NEW[/b] Progress, Status & Public Status Available
[b]NEW[/b] Reply & Favorite to Progress, Status & Public Status Feeds (May require more testing)
[b]NEW[/b] Staff items now included in anime and manga pages (viewing not available yet)
[b]NEW[/b] New settings entry (General) allows to you to customize what happens when you press the + button your anime lists or airing anime
[b]Bug Fix[/b] Too many to mention
changelogversion.changelogbug: What's broken in this version? Well infinite scroll will causes some changes when android tries to save the state of lists
Why does the liking of posts sometimes reset the scroll position? Long story short it's a bug XD
changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]I'm going to be a bit more busy than usual from now, so updates will be slow but I'll try to upload source code on GitHub after I finish making some documentation[/b]

[b]NEW[/b] Light & dark theme for the whole application scope

[b]NEW[/b] Application settings to configure notifications

[b]NEW[/b] New navigation menu items for your Anime & Manga Lists, *limited to 3 items for now*
